author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Fixes #3782 #2565 #4011 #4013

* Fix double help topic printing issue
* Fix regressions introduced by change a52adcd
* Use WildcardPattern to fix tab completion

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @powercode I changed some code CompletionCompleters.cs which was modified by you recently. Can you please have a look?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @PowerShell/powershell-maintainers This PR is ready to merge.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Opened issue https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4037 as discussed for refactoring.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan If you search `new CompletionContext { ` in `CompletionCompleters.cs` you will find 5 more instances of it which are not updated in this PR. Do they need to be fixed as well?

title: Fix various about topic help issues
